entry.title: Hello world
entry.content:
Welcome

Hello world. Welcome to my blog, powered by Octopress. This blog will mainly contain content about my computer setup, workflow and tools I use in my PhD. This is stuff I’ve mainly discovered from other blogs, so I’m just sharing the love!

About

I’ve customised Octopress’s classic style, based on the changes made by blogger Aijaz Ansari. The fonts, Droid Serif and Droid Sans are provided by Google Fonts.
